Not Untitled

My name is Matt Mills. I spit hot photos.

snow x2

My photos from the first snow storm were a little too depressing… not in that they were bad, but you can tell looking at them that I feel like shit. Since I feel a lot better now (o hai spring), I’m leaving them out. But these, from the second storm, are better.

Meanwhile, everything is moving along. Haven’t gotten any closer on planning those shoots I wanted to do. I need to email a bunch of people, I suppose, and gather all the supplies I’ll need. Lights. A stuffed wolf or puma. A stone spearhead. A stick. Model. Location. Storyboards, maybe even.
